During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells and play with their hands and the top cards of their libraries revealed. You can play lands and cast spells from their hands and the tops of their libraries.

You may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard, but not from anywhere else.
If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards exiled with this creature to their owners' hands.
